summary.span: 表示 值的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的成员完全按照 、和 文档中所述的方式进行，但如果尝试将 `null` 插入到集合中，此实现将引发 。Members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation, except that this implementation throws an if you attempt to insert `null` into the collection. **冻结功能：** 因为它继承自 类，所以 类提供若干特殊功能： 对象可以声明为、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关 对象提供的不同功能的详细信息，请参阅可[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreKInt32Values**oneOrMoreKInt32Values* 一个或多个 值，每个对都由一个逗号和/或一个或多个空格分隔：One or more values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces: _[分隔符__]\*__[delimiter__]\*_ 例如，`"5 10 43"` 和 `"5,10,43"` 都是有效的。For example, `"5 10 43"` and `"5,10,43"` are both valid.
